Package uk.ac.ucl.motioninput

Interface ModuleCamera

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HandsCamera
    public interface ModuleCamera
    Interface for a Camera, an object that combines a module with a NewCameraInput

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void closeCamera()
      Closes camera, module, and any other components Sets surface view to invisible
      NewCameraInput getCameraInput()
      Get module-specific camera input
      EGLContext getEGLContext()
      Get module-specific EGLContext
      com.google.mediapipe.solutioncore.SolutionGlSurfaceView<?> getSurfaceView()
      Get the module camera's SolutionGlSurfaceView
      void setCameraInput​(NewCameraInput ci)
      Initialises the module camera with a NewCameraInput
      void setupCameraWithModule()
      Initialises each individual component and connects the glSurfaceView to the camera to have it update when a new MediaPipe Result is available
